segments.text: My name is Steven Smith and I'm calling to cancel my plane ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you mind telling me the reason ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to continue to deal with my business . I haven ’ t finished it yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . Would you like me to reschedule you for another time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you have to pay the fee for refund .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I will pay it by my bank card .
segments.speaker: S1
